description: This file implements an observability middleware for FastAPI/Starlette applications, handling request logging, correlation ID propagation, latency measurement, and metrics reporting.

classes.name: ObservabilityMiddleware
classes.description: Middleware class for logging, measuring, and propagating request observability data.

methods.name: dispatch
methods.description: Asynchronous method that handles request processing, logging, metrics, and correlation ID management.
